<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Femeninos o masculinos de la primera declinación griega</string>
            <string language="en">Feminine or masculine words from the Greek first declension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weibliche oder männliche Wörter von der 
griechischen ersten Deklination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots féminins ou masculins de la première 
déclinaison grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras feminine ou masculine do primeiro 
declension grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole femminili o maschili dalla prima 
declinazione greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θηλυκές ή αρσενικές λέξεις από την ελληνική πρώτη 
κλίση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad consistente en hacer click sobre una palabra femenina o masculina de la primera declinación griega para introducirla en el cuadro de su correspondiente caso, mediante otro click.</string>
            <string language="en">Activity consisting in clicking on a feminine or masculine word from the Greek first declension to put it into the chart of its corresponding case with another click.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primera declinación</string>
            <string language="en">first declension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Femeninos o masculinos</string>
            <string language="en">Feminine or masculine</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität, die wenn an ein weibliches oder 
männliches Wort von der griechischen ersten Deklination, um geklickt 
wird sie in das Diagramm seines entsprechenden Falles mit einem 
anderen Klicken zu setzen besteht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité consistant en cliquant sur un 
mot féminin ou masculin de la première déclinaison grecque pour la 
mettre dans le diagramme de son cas correspondant avec un autre 
clic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade que consiste em estalar sobre uma 
palavra feminine ou masculine do primeiro declension grego para pô-lo
na carta de seu caso correspondente com um outro clique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività che è costituita nello scattare sopra 
una parola femminile o maschile dalla prima declinazione greca per 
metterla nella tabella del relativo caso corrispondente con un altro 
scatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα που συνίσταται στον κρότο σε μια θηλυκή 
ή αρσενική λέξη από την ελληνική πρώτη κλίση για να το βάλει 
στο διάγραμμα της αντίστοιχης περίπτωσής του με ένα άλλο 
στιγμιαίο πάτημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erste Deklination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weiblich oder männlich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">première déclinaison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Féminin ou masculin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">primeiro declension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feminine ou masculine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prima declinazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Femminile o maschile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρώτη κλίση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θηλυκός ή αρσενικός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
